title: Feature request: allow configure "spack install --fail-fast" by default
body:
There's no reason IMHO, to go on building if one of the packages required to build a spec failed.

```


$ spack install llvm %clang
==> Installing libiconv-1.16-6skh44qvimekythdydj43s5sy4p73rof
```
